name: homebrew-expert
description: Expert guidance for creating, publishing, and automating Homebrew packages (formulas and casks) with GitHub Actions. Use when user asks to create Homebrew casks/formulas, set up personal taps, configure CI/CD for Homebrew, publish to official Homebrew, create meta-casks, or troubleshoot Homebrew-related issues. Based on real-world implementation of homebrew_all_fonts project with working CI workflows and successful personal tap deployment.
author: Based on homebrew_all_fonts implementation
